short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify Course Registration with Just One Click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Frustrated with missing out on Classes? Meet UW CourseKeeper!

When a class notification goes off, you scramble to enter SLN codes - only for the class to fill up before you’re done typing. Sound familiar? This Chrome extension syncs directly with UW's MyPlan and Notify.UW, keeping your SLN codes ready at your fingertips, so you can snag that class without the rush.

🔑 Key Features:
- Quick Sync: SLN codes automatically sync from MyPlan and Notify.UW. 📒
- Instant Access: Dropdown menus on the registration page - no typing, just select! 🔽
- Simple Organization: Star your priority courses for quick access. ⭐️
- Copy & Paste SLNs: Prevent mistakes by copying SLN codes straight from the extension popup. 🛑

🛠️ How to Use:
- Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store and pin it for quick access.
- Sync SLN codes automatically by visiting https://notify.uw.edu/notify/
- Add or drop courses by clicking the bell icon in MyPlan or updating your preferences directly on Notify.UW.
- Register using the dropdown menus added directly on your registration page.
- Manage your SLNs easily from the extension popup.

🔒 Privacy First: We don’t store your data. All information stays local to your browser.

Stop missing out - get UW CourseKeeper and register for classes stress-free!
